input.sentences: dr. [male] decided to visit a local community college and give a seminar .
dr. [male] gave a seminar in cell biology .
dr. [male] answered many different student quetsions .
dr. [male] was presented an award by the president of the college .
the biology department really appreciated dr. [male] ' lecture .
output.sentences: The doctor mentally prepared to speak at the seminar.
He looked around the crowd to see what kind of audience members he would be lecturing this afternoon.
As he presented his lecture points, all eyes were fixated on him.
He was shocked that as he finished he was presented with an award for heart surgeon of the year.
He felt truly connected to the profession he had sacrificed his time and energy towards.
